wifi: wil6210: debugfs: fix uninitialized variable use in `wil_write_file_wmi()`

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.256 by commit c9fde3a44da566d8929070ab6bda4f0dfa9955d0, it was introduced in version v4.19.256 by commit 4615458db7793fadc6d546ac3564b36819e77a22. For more details please see the references link.
